byline.original: By ERIC LIPTON and CLIFFORD KRAUSS
byline.contributor: Eric Lipton reported from Washington and Clifford Krauss reported from Houston. Kitty Bennett contributed research.

snippet: Like Solyndra, the now-famous California solar company, Nevada Geothermal Power is facing financial trouble after encountering problems at its only operating plant.
lead_paragraph: Like Solyndra, the now-famous California solar company, Nevada Geothermal Power is facing financial trouble after encountering problems at its only operating plant.

headline.main: A U.S.-Backed Geothermal Plant in Nevada Struggles
headline.print_headline: A U.S.-Backed Geothermal Plant in Nevada Struggles
headline.seo: A U.S.-Backed Geothermal Plant in Nevada Struggles
